report.title: Counts per record with group and flower
report.description: Filtered for UK (with IOM) only, April-Sept inclusive. New version of report designed to fix some problems and can be compared to the original report.
report.query: WITH filtered_samples AS ( SELECT csf.id, csf.date_end, csf.location_ids FROM cache_samples_functional csf WHERE csf.survey_id IN (636, 641, 637) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM csf.date_end) BETWEEN 4 AND 9 AND csf.training = false AND csf.location_ids && ARRAY[214127, 1612, 1606, 1605, 1614]) SELECT csf.id AS sample, cttl.preferred_taxon AS taxon, csn.attrs_json ->> '1050' AS flower, COALESCE((con.attrs_json ->> '666')::int, 0) AS pomscount FROM filtered_samples csf JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csn ON csn.id = csf.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof ON cof.sample_id = csn.id AND cof.training = false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional con ON con.id = cof.id LEFT JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl ON cttl.id = cof.taxa_taxon_list_id AND cttl.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id IN (418854,418855,418856,418857,418858,418859,418860,418861,419001,419076);
